mapper.select: SELECT prod_id ,prod_name ,prod_price ,spec ,model_name ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') reg_date FROM products WHERE prod_id = #{prodId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (prod_name, prod_price, reg_date, spec, model_name) VALUES (#{prodName}, #{prodPrice}, now(), #{spec}, #{modelName})
